description:
[h1]The mod is for 0.5.1, probably doesnt work well on 0.6.x[/h1]

Adds sliding to all game modes!
Just press a directional key and crouch, its that easy.
*explosive tape firing spudgun not included

[h1]Installation[/h1]
[list]
[*]Copy the Survival, Creative and ChallengeData folders from Your Drive:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\2686500371
[*]Paste them in Your Drive:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\Scrap Mechanic
[*]Overwrite all files
[*]Enjoy!
[/list]

god I hope this works in multiplayer lmfao
name: Sliding!
